answers.answer: Hello,Without examination confirmation of a diagnosis is tough but frequent urination(polyuria) and frequent thirst(polydypsia) can be due to diabetes mellitus.Other possibilities are diabetes insipidus,glomerulonephritis,tubular necrosis,pyelonephritis(inflammation of the kidneys),urinary tract infection,hypercalcemia,hypokalemia(low potassium),hyperthyroidism,hyperparathyroidism,diuretic drugs and psychogenic polydypsia.Excessive sleepiness can be due to sleep apnea and other sleep-related breathing disorders, psychiatric disorders like depression and schizophrenia,diabetes,obesity,restless leg syndrome,use of drugs or alcohol and narcolepsy(Abnormal sleep disorder leading to excessive daytime drowsiness).In both obesity and diabetes are prominment and need immediate evaluation.Investigations like blood sugar levels, urine examination,culture sensitivity,ultrasound abdomen,blood tests like kidney function tests,thyroid profile and electrolyte levels are needed to confirm a diagnosis.In my opinion you should consult a physician and get yourself evaluated for these possibilities.Hope it helps.Take care and regards.

question: HEY,I AM A 24 YR OLD AFRICAN AMERICAN WOMAN FROM NYC............ I AM OBESE SO TO SPEAK...........I HAVE FREQUENT URINATION, EXTREME SLEEPING AND VERY THIRSTY............ ALSO, MY BOSY TEMPERATURE SEEMS TO ALWAYS BE ELEVATED..........PLEASE SOMEONE CONTACT ME AND LET ME KNOW SHOULD I BE ALARMED
title: About me
